TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ActivityTrackingLocation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.

span.span: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当活动的执行状态发生更改时，工作流实例会将一个活动状态事件发出到运行时跟踪基础结构。Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 当发生活动状态事件时，运行时跟踪基础结构可以向跟踪服务发送 。The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an whenever an activity status event occurs. 通常，跟踪服务不会关注工作流实例中发生的每个活动状态事件，而只关注与位于工作流实例中指定位置的某种活动关联的活动状态事件。Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance. 通过指定以下各项为此类位置定义匹配参数：引用活动类型、一组活动状态更改事件，以及一组可对引用活动类型的一个或多个实例加以更精确限定的条件。An defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type. > [!NOTE] > 单一 可以引用工作流实例的可能执行路径中的多个实际位置。A single may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance. 可以将 对象添加到 和 ，以便为 中的 定义匹配参数。You add objects to and in order to define the match parameters for an in a . 必须通过设置 或 来指定要匹配的引用活动类型。You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either or . 您可以设置 ，以指定对派生自引用活动类型的活动的关注。You may set to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type. 您可以将 值添加到 以指定要匹配的活动状态事件。You may add values to to specify the activity status events to be matched. 您可以将 对象添加到 以指定仅关注特定条件的引用活动类型。You may add objects to to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions. 例如，您可以指定仅关注引用活动类型的某个特定命名实例。For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.

span.span: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须指定引用活动类型的非限定名称。You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type. 例如，若要指定 活动的非限定名称，请将 设置为“CodeActivity”。For example, to specify the unqualified name of a activity set to "CodeActivity". 当您用 XML 直接编写配置文件时，通过 可以更为轻松地指定引用活动类型。 provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML. 还提供了一种与版本无关的方式来对引用活动类型进行引用。 also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type. 必须为 指定 或 。You must specify either the or for the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Conditions As TrackingConditionCollection

summary.span: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.

span.span: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.

value.span: 一个包含条件的 ，这些条件用于限定对活动的关注。

span.span: A that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 更精确地定义要匹配的引用活动类型的实例。You can use to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched. 例如，如果要仅匹配 等于“MyCode”的 活动，您可以将 设置为“CodeActivity”，并将 添加到 ，后者指定活动实例的 属性必须等于“MyCode”。For example, if you want to match only activities with an equal to "MyCode", you can set to"CodeActivity" and add an to that specifies that the property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode". 中的每个 都必须为 `true`，并且，必须匹配 中的其中一个 值才能使 匹配。Every in must be `true` and one of the values in must be matched for the to be matched.

summary.span: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.

span.span: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含一个或多个 值。

span.span: A that contains one or more of the values.
The default is an empty list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定可为其匹配 的活动状态事件。 specifies the activity status events for which the can be matched. 必须匹配 中的其中一个 值，并且 中的每个 均必须为 `true`，才能使 匹配。One of the values in must be matched and every in must be `true` for the to be matched. 空列表指定没有要匹配的事件。An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
